Fandom : BNHA

Summary : Sensei finds his student in a closet...
body:
Lifeboat 「Aizawa」

Lifeboat 「Aizawa」

Fandom : BNHA

Pairing : Aizawa/ Student!Reader (NOT ROMANTIC)

Summary : Sensei finds his student in a closet cause of anxiety.

Word Count : 374

TW: Anixety attack.

NOTE THIS ISN’T A ROMANTIC JUST FAMILA NOT STUDENT X TEACHER!!!

　　　　　 ̶»̶ ̶̶̶ ̶ ̶ ̶̶̶ ̶»̶«̶ ̶̶̶ ̶ ̶ ̶̶̶ ̶«̶ ̶̶̶ ̶　　　　　　 ̶

Too many voices

“Kacchan!”

“Stupid Deku!”

“I’ll kill you!”

Too many sounds

Ring ring ring

You just need them all to stop.

Knock knock

You blinked and stared at the closet door. That was being knocked on?

The door slid open and light flooded in on your face.

Aizawa stared at you shaking and hiding your face in your school uniform jacket.

He called you by your name and you didn’t answer.

You hid your face in your legs, you just needed to clear your head.

Mister Aizawa got down on his knees and just analyzed you.

“Hey,” Mister Aiwaza grabbed your hand and was shocked to see your hand not moved it was like you were frozen in place.

But your eyes bounced around the walls and your heart beating faster and faster.

It was clear that you were having an anxiety attacking.

Mister Aizawa called you by your name again and when you didn’t respond he stood up and walked out of the classroom.

Leaving you…

He came back with a towel, a wet one.

He moved your neck and placed the wet towel on the back of your neck.

Slowly your body temperature lower and you felt as if someone was holding you back from breathing. They had finally released and you blinked.

You tried to speak but Mister Aizawa held up his hand. “Don’t speak.”

He stood up again and went inside his desk.

He gave you an apple box and straw.

He sat down next to you and drank his apple juice in silence.

Finally he sighed, “It’s okay to take a break, you can’t be in control of everything around you.”

You looked up at him, “You don’t always predict what’s gonna happen next kid.”

You nodded, “Sometimes you have to let life pass you by and you can take the next train,”

You tilted your head.

“That didn’t make any sense I know.”

Afterwards Mister Aizawa made sure you have what is called a chill pass, during class if you need to take a break, he’ll hand you a juice box and you sit outside.

He never spoke about what happens to anyone he just gives you the juice box and you relax.

　　　　　 ̶»̶ ̶̶̶ ̶ ̶ ̶̶̶ ̶»̶«̶ ̶̶̶ ̶ ̶ ̶̶̶ ̶«̶ ̶̶̶ ̶　　　　　　 ̶

title: Get There
description:
by wrunic

Bakugou stood up and stretched, which made the hem of his shirt rise up, which meant skin. Eijirou was suddenly very warm, because apparently a symptom of having past lives is having the constitution of a fucking Victorian ingenue.

Eijirou turned away from Bakugou before he could realize that Eijirou’s face was currently the same colour as his hair.

“HEY, so I’ve been thinking,” Eijirou said, focusing very intently on cleaning the mugs and trying his best to sound like he wasn’t losing his shit (because he wasn’t, that would be ridiculous), “that maybe we should go get you your own clothes.”

Words: 4962, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

title: Love Can Kill || Hanahaki
description:
by Qrainee

•"An embodiment of the sun; that was Katsuki’s first thought when he saw him.“•

The Hanahaki Disease first originated in Greenland with 129 deaths in total and it spread rapidly to other countries. The epidemic suffocates it’s victims with beautiful flowers. Doctors worked night and day to find a cure. The only way to stop the flowers is undergoing surgery or having your crush return your feelings.

Katsuki Bakugo is the first person to cough up rose petals.

So, let me say this, this is from an RP my bestie and I was doing. I wrote this on Google Docs and figured, why not post it! It’s not my best work and honestly, it’s my first time writing something for the My Hero Academia fandom. I’m fairly new to the fandom and this just popped into my head last night. I want to apologize for Shigaraki being OOC at all. The RP is not reader insert, she’s my own OC. Long story short, her name is Kohana Mori. She’s a villain in this one. She has white hair and blue eyes, pale skin, and is fairly thin. The RP for this one hasn’t gone very far so not sure about much with her. Either way, please enjoy some deliciously pointless Tomura Shigaraki smut. Because he is one of my babies and needs more love. Side note: Her name translates to Little Flower Forest.

This is rated M. Features smut, cussing, and possible triggers. 18+ readers would be best but honestly, I can’t exactly stop you. You have been warned. Also, possible dub-con because let’s be honest, the teasing and threats get bad.
